titleStmt.title: All praise and glory be given to God alone. These are to certifie all whom it may concern, that the ever famous physician Gilbert Anderson, hath travelled through most part of the known world, in search of the most rare secrets of physick and chirurgery....
titleStmt.author: Anderson, Gilbert.

titleStmt.title: All praise and glory be given to God alone. These are to certifie all whom it may concern, that the ever famous physician Gilbert Anderson, hath travelled through most part of the known world, in search of the most rare secrets of physick and chirurgery....
titleStmt.author: Anderson, Gilbert.

notesStmt.note: Title taken from caption and first lines of text.
Wing has variation in spelling of author's name: Gilbert Andersone.
Includes three certificates from St. Giles in the Fields, Congal in Sweden, and St. Botolph without Aldgate.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
